title: Having lag spike after updating patch 6.14
body: I've never have lag spike before... NEVER. When this patch updated I'm starting to have it. Lag spike happens like every 10 secs which mess me up at bad moments like mis-timing my flash, skillshot delayed, etc. It really ruins my gameplay... Don't think my internet have problems. When I play other online games, no lag spikes. Is there anything I can do to fix this? I did use the "repair" tool that the client offers and it did not work.

replies.body: Infrequent lag spikes like this can be due to your network suffering from packet loss, which can be a result of  your routing or some instability.  I recommend running a[ log reader ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader)to get an overview of your connection.  The analysis will also provide a list of troubleshooting instructions specific to your issue.  Let me know what you come up!
